name: 陳世楷
objective: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
schedule:
週次   單元主題
1   Introduction
2   Basic Principles of Ground-Water Flow
3   Dissolved Mass in Ground Water
4   Theory of Ground-Water Flow
5   Theory of Ground-Water Flow in Unsaturated Zone and Fractured Media
6   Response of Confined Aquifers to Pumping
7   Leaky Confined Aquifers and Partially Penetrating Wells
8   Response of an Unconfined Aquifer to Pumping
9   期中考 (40%)
10  Slug, Step, and Intermittent Tests
11  Superposition and Bounded Aquifers
12  Drilling and Electric Resistivity Method
13  Drilling and Electric Resistivity Method
14  Kinetic and Equilibrium Reactions
15  Key Reactions Influencing Ground-Water Chemistry
16  Basics of Transport, Advection, and Dispersion
17  Basics of Transport, Advection, and Dispersion
18  期末考 (40%)
scorePolicy:
期中考 (40%)
期末報告 (40%)
平時成績(20%)
materials:
教科書：(1) Franklin W. Schwartz : Fundamentals of Ground Water
(2) 地下水中、英文教材 (自編)
